0.quote: Weeks of programming can save you hours of planning.
0.author: Unknown

1.quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
1.author: Confucius

2.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
2.author: Albert Einstein

4.quote: When we hit our lowest point, we are open to the greatest change.
4.author: Avatar Aang

5.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
5.author: Haruki Murakami

6.quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
6.author: Victor Kiam

7.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
7.author: Thomas A. Edison

8.quote: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
8.author: Stephen Hawking

9.quote: First learn computer science and all the theory. Next develop a programming style. Then forget all that and just hack.
9.author: George Carrette

10.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
10.author: Bruce Lee

11.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
11.author: John Wooden

12.quote: Sometimes you can't see yourself clearly until you see yourself through the eyes of others.
12.author: Ellen DeGeneres

13.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
13.author: Confucius

14.quote: Sometimes you can't see yourself clearly until you see yourself through the eyes of others.
14.author: Ellen DeGeneres

15.quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
15.author: Warren Buffett

16.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
16.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

17.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
17.author: Robert Collier

18.quote: Looking at code you wrote more than two weeks ago is like looking at code you are seeing for the first time.
18.author: Dan Hurvitz

19.quote: Everybody has talent, but ability takes hard work.
19.author: Michael Jordan

about.title: Check it out!
about.description: Here is a list of technologies and skills I have been working with and obtained.

jobs.title: Front-End Developer
jobs.description: Programs the front end environment on multiple platforms. Designs and creates the front end environment for The Basic Needs app. Reports weekly to the Lead Backend Developer and Content Manager. Collaborates with team members to further simplify interfaces.

jobs.title: Firmware Engineer
jobs.description: Document all projects relating to the development of the BMS. Ensures ALL documentation is current and easily replicated for all relevant parties. Programming the ATTiny85 chip with Digispark. Developing and designing smart batteries that are easily scalable and able to manage themselves.

jobs.title: Digital Media Assistant
jobs.company: The Foster Family of Engineering Service Learning
jobs.description: Designed marketing materials for various departments and community. Managed Eventbright website events and all social media accounts of department. Helped manage Skill Session Workshops. Composed Annual Report and managed Professional Photoshoot for the department.

jobs.title: Intellectual Property Officer
jobs.description: Maintained all the teamâ€™s project documentation and reported to position clients. Ensures ALL documentation is current and accessible for all relevant parties. Composed the Semester Proposal and Project Reports.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.company: UC Merced Recreation and Athletics Department
jobs.description: Created visual appealing graphics to promote and market events held by either the Recreation and Athletics department. Collaborate with the Recreation & Athletics professional and student staff. Created Game day posters, Outdoor Experience Program flyers, and Digital Signage for events.

jobs.title: Full-Service Shopper
jobs.description: Fully services Instacart customers by shopping and delivering their groceries accurately, fresh, and on time.

jobs.title: Technical Director
jobs.description: Produces and records school announcements live while also managing the broadcasting team. Also takes in charge of other non-school related projects. Skillfully operates a video switcher and creates graphics and video segments.
